title: The Mark of the Whistler (restored, colorized) (1944, film noir, imdb score: 6.5)

sources.title: The Mark of the Whistler (restored, colorized) (1944, film noir, imdb score: 6.5)
sources.description: The Mark of the Whistler, aka The Marked Man, is a 1944 American  mystery film   noir  based on the  radio drama   The Whistler . Directed by  William Castle , the production features  Richard Dix ,  Porter Hall  and  Janis Carter . It is the second of  Columbia Pictures ' eight " Whistler " films produced in the 1940s, all but the last starring Dix.
